column2:
epds_wf <-
  epds_lf %>% 
  select(ID, timepoint, epds_total) %>% 
  spread(timepoint, epds_total) %>% 
  rename(
    epds_t1 = T1,
    epds_t2 = T2,
    epds_t3 = T3
  ) %>% 
  mutate(
    epds_t1_concern = if_else(
      epds_t1 > 10, "clinical concern", "none"
    ),
    epds_t2_concern = if_else(
      epds_t2 > 10, "clinical concern", "none"
    ),
    epds_t3_concern = if_else(
      epds_t3 > 10, "clinical concern", "none"
    )
  ) %>% 
  group_by(ID) %>% 
  mutate(
    max_epds_t1t2 = max(c(epds_t1, epds_t2), na.rm = TRUE),
    max_epds_t1t2 = if_else(max_epds_t1t2 == -Inf, NA_real_, max_epds_t1t2)
  ) %>% 
  ungroup()
